item.title: An alternative to 'var_dump' in PHP
item.description: Whilst working with PHP, I seem to use var_dump a ridiculous amount. It’s a debugging must-have. However, it does fall short in a few ways. It does not take into consideration that the function is almost always displayed on an HTML page, and switching to the page source can be troublesome. Due to these pitfalls, a host of projects such as Krumo and Kint have emerged to cater for these needs. In addition to these projects, if you have XDebug installed, it will replace the default var_dump function with its own implementation that outputs the information with much-needed styling.
